name: Alt Text Generator AI – Generate & Update Alt Texts For Your Images In Bulk
author: AltTextGenerator AI

sections.description:
AltTextGenerator AI is designed to revolutionize the way you handle image alt texts on your WordPress site. With just a click, our plugin scans your media library, identifies images without alt texts, and employs a state-of-the-art AI Computer Vision model to generate descriptive and SEO-friendly alt texts.

Key Features:

  • One-click Alt Text Generation: Initiate the alt text generation process with a single click.
  • Automated Scanning: Continuously monitors your media library for new uploads.
  • Bulk Alt Text Generation: Generate alt texts for all your images at once.
  • Review and Edit: Maintain full control by reviewing and editing generated alt texts as needed.
  • Bulk Update in WordPress: Update all your alt texts in one go, seamlessly integrating with your media library.
  • Pay As You Go Pricing: No monthly subscriptions. Just pay for the images you optimize, starting with 10 free credits.
  • State-of-the-Art Technology: Our AI model, trained on millions of images, ensures high accuracy and industry-leading performance.

AltTextGenerator AI is specifically built for WordPress, ensuring easy installation and compatibility with your existing images. It’s not just a tool; it’s a game-changer for your website’s SEO and accessibility.

For more details and advanced features, visit our official website: https://alttextgenerator.ai
sections.installation:
1. Upload alttextgenerator-ai.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to your WordPress admin panel and locate ‘Alt Text Generator AI’ in the menu to start enhancing your images.
sections.faq:
What is Alt Text?

Alt text (alternative text) is a brief description of an image used within the HTML of a website. It’s crucial for website accessibility, especially for visually impaired users who rely on screen readers. Alt text also plays a pivotal role in SEO, helping search engines understand the content of images.

How does the AI model generate alt texts?

Our state-of-the-art Computer Vision model has been trained on millions of images. It analyzes each image and writes a descriptive alt text, ensuring both accuracy and relevance for SEO.

How is the pricing structured?

We offer a pay-as-you-go pricing model. You start with 10 free credits, and after that, you can purchase additional credits as needed. Each credit corresponds to an image optimized.

Can I manually edit the generated alt texts?

Absolutely! While our AI model aims for accuracy, you always have the flexibility to review, edit, or refine the generated alt texts as needed.
sections.changelog:
1.7.2

  • Fixed: Resolved an issue where when editing the alt texts manually the editing box would not appear.

1.7.0

  • Initial release.
